department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Coffee pot, decorated with arabesques in an all-over pattern, Cylindrical inside compartment, with a grate below, and separate lid, probably for charcoal, to heat liquid. The lower section is enclosed in openwork arabesques. Spout has hinged lid.
dimension: 12 x 5 x 5 in. (30.5 x 12.7 x 12.7 cm) (diameter of base)
title: Coffee Pot
